mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TestBoard (id, is_closed, current_participants, total_participants, title, hashtags, author, content, view_count, comment_count, reg_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{isClosed}, #{currentParticipants}, #{totalParticipants}, #{title}, #{hashtags}, #{author}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, #{commentCount}, #{regDate})
mapper.update: update TestBoard set title=#{title},content=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from TestBoard order by reg_date;
